r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: PCBC-761: fix return interface for expiryTime methods. PCBC-760: expose error messages in query exceptions. PCBC-759: take into account 'decoder.json_arrays' INI setting when decoding Query rows. PCBC-758: raise exception if invalid CAS passed to unlock. PCBC-729: update URLs for Collections management API.
